text: Bagnolet is a town in the east suburbs of Paris, France. It is 5.2 km (3.2 mi) from the center of Paris and is in the department of Seine-Saint-Denis. About 34,595 people lived there in 2006. == Education == From 1989 to 1999, the aviation engineering school Institut polytechnique des sciences avanc√©es was in the town. ==Other websites== *Official website (in French) Category:Communes in Seine-Saint-Denis
title: Bagnolet
